title: Understanding the Concept
text: When analyzing survey data, it's important to distinguish between different statistical terms. The average satisfaction score from a sample is a specific type of measurement.

title: Defining a Statistic
text: A statistic is a numerical value that describes a characteristic of a sample. In this case, the average satisfaction score is calculated from the sample of $$50$$ customers.

title: Identifying the Correct Term
text: Given that the average satisfaction score is derived from a sample, what is the correct term for this measurement?
